card.name: Pistola de Raio-Z
card.text: This creature gets +3 power and gains, "Before Fight: Deal 3D to each neighbor of the creature this creature fights."

card.name: Chamado do Vazio
card.text: Play: Exhaust a creature. If it was already exhausted, destroy it instead and its controller loses 1A.

card.name: Xenotreinamento
card.text: Play: For each house represented among friendly creatures, a friendly creature captures 1A.

card.name: Disputas Internas
card.text: Play: Each creature deals damage equal to its power to its right neighbor.

card.name: Urso Ultimogênito
card.text: Reap: You may reap with 1 of Youngest Bear's neighbors.

card.name: Humildade
card.text: Play: Exhaust a creature. If you do, move 3A from that creature to the common supply.

card.name: Paraguardião
card.text: Reap: You may exalt Paraguardian. If you do, ward each of its neighbors.

card.name: Missão Épica
card.text: Play: Archive each friendly Knight creature from play. Omni: If you have played 7 or more Sanctum cards this turn, destroy Epic Quest and forge a key at no cost.

card.name: Pequena Niff
card.text: Omega. Deploy. Elusive. After a neighbor of Little Niff fights, steal 1A.

card.name: Tecnoblablablá
card.text: Play: Stun a creature and each of its neighbors that shares a house with it.

card.name: Diplomata Agung
card.text: Play/Fight/Reap: For the remainder of the turn, a friendly creature belongs to the house of your choice in addition to its other houses.

card.name: Aura Vingativa
card.text: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature gains assault X, where X is the number of forged keys your opponent has.

card.name: Matriz de Série Estática
card.text: (M) Your keys cost –1A while the tide is high and +1A while the tide is low.

card.name: Mentorazilda
card.text: Elusive. At the end of your turn, put a scheme counter on Mastermindy. Action: Remove each scheme counter from Mastermindy. Steal 1A for each scheme counter removed this way.

card.name: "Empresta Aí"
card.text: Play: Take control of an enemy artifact. While under your control, it belongs to house Shadows. (Instead of its original house.)

card.name: Cessaforja
card.text: Play: Put 2 time counters on Ceaseforge. Players cannot forge keys. At the start of your turn, remove a time counter from Ceaseforge, then destroy it if there are no time counters on it.

card.name: Calote
card.text: Play: Deal 2D to a creature. If it is not destroyed, it captures 1A from its own side.

card.name: Dia de Praia
card.text: (M) Play: Return a creature to its owner's hand. If the tide is high, gain 1A.

card.name: Primus Unguis
card.text: Each friendly creature gets +2 power for each A on Primus Unguis. Reap: Exalt Primus Unguis.

card.name: Reboquetrovão
card.text: Play: Exhaust 2 creatures. Deal 2D to each exhausted creature.

card.name: Núcleo Isotrópico
card.text: Each friendly creature gains hazardous 1. (Before that creature is attacked, deal 1D to the attacking enemy.)

card.name: Terrível Synan
card.text: Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.) Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)

card.name: Lærie do Lago
card.text: (M) While the tide is high, Lærie of the Lake gets +5 armor.

card.name: Dinosculpe-me
card.text: Play: Destroy a creature. Its controller gains 1A.

card.name: Veículo Exploratório
card.text: Action: Exhaust up to 3 friendly creatures. For each house represented among creatures exhausted this way, draw a card.

card.name: Onda Purificante
card.text: Play: Heal 1 damage from each creature. Gain 1A for each creature healed this way.

card.name: Atacar!
card.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each creature you play gains, “Play: Deal 2D to an enemy creature.”

card.name: Omnipus
card.text: Omnipus cannot fight. Play: Discard the top 8 cards of your deck. Play each Tentaclid from your discard pile, one at a time. Reap: Gain 1A for each friendly Tentaclid.

card.name: Devorador de Cérebros
card.text: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Brain Eater, draw a card.

card.name: Submersível
card.text: (M) While the tide is high, each friendly Thief creature gains elusive.

card.name: Aproveitador
card.text: Action: If your opponent has 6A or more, steal 2A.

card.name: Caríbdis
card.text: Each enemy creatures gains, "Before Fight: Lose 1A."

card.name: Curar ou Ferir
card.text: Play: Choose one: • Fully heal a creature and gain 1A. • Ready and fight with a friendly creature.

card.name: EIS Indômitus
card.text: Action: Exhaust up to 5 friendly Saurian creatures. For each creature exhausted this way, deal 1D to each enemy creature.

card.name: Desvio Genético
card.text: Play: Give a creature a +1 power counter. Then give each creature with a +1 power counter another +1 power counter.

card.name: Canhão de Mão
card.text: This creature gains skirmish and, "Fight: Move 1A from the creature this creature fights to your pool."

card.name: Sussurros
card.text: Elusive. Action: Lose 1A. If you do, destroy a creature.

card.name: Lagarta
card.text: Hazardous 6. Action: Return a Bombyx from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Brutamontes
card.text: Assault 2. (Before this creature attacks, deal 2D to the attacked enemy.) Each of Bull-wark's neighbors gains assault 2.

card.name: Velho Turrão
card.text: (M) Reap: Discard the bottom card of your opponent's deck, or the bottom 3 cards instead if the tide is high. Destroy a creature that shares a house with 1 of the discarded cards.

card.name: Andar na Prancha
card.text: Play: If your opponent has no A, deal 4D to a creature. Otherwise, steal 1A.

card.name: Rajada Mental
card.text: Play: Deal 1D to each creature for each card you have played this turn (including this one).

card.name: Taxas da Cidade-Estado
card.text: Play: Each friendly creature captures 1A.

card.name: Tubarão-Æmbar
card.text: At the end of your turn, each player loses 1A. Give Æmberfin Shark a +1 power counter for each A lost this way.

card.name: Fortes ou Fracos
card.text: Play: Choose one: • Purge each creature with the highest power. • Purge each creature with the lowest power.

card.name: Luz Eterna
card.text: Play: Play a Sanctum creature from your discard pile anywhere in your battleline.

card.name: Preservação Seletiva
card.text: Play: Choose a creature of each power value. Destroy each creature not chosen.

card.name: Glutão
card.text: Skirmish. After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Chonkers, double the number of +1 power counters on Chonkers. Play: Give Chonkers a +1 power counter.

card.name: Guardáguas
card.text: (M) Play/Reap: If the tide is high, your opponent raises the tide. Otherwise, you raise the tide.

card.name: Capitã Val Jericó
card.text: While Captain Val Jericho is in the center of your battleline, you may play 1 card that is not of the active house during your turn.

card.name: Gebuk
card.text: Destroyed: Discard the top card of your deck. If it is a creature, after Gebuk leaves play, put that creature into play in Gebuk’s position in the battleline.

card.name: Cientista Felix
card.text: (M) Play/Fight: If the tide is high, you may exalt a creature.

card.name: Mestra Vita
card.text: Play/Fight: You may exalt a friendly non-Saurian creature. If you do, fight with it.

card.name: Clariel Forjaluz
card.text: Action: Switch a creature's power and armor for the remainder of the turn.

card.name: Kaupe
card.text: Your opponent cannot play more than 1 card of each card type (action, artifact, creature, upgrade) each turn.

card.name: Mack, a Faca
card.text: Elusive. You may use Mack the Knife as if it belonged to the active house. Action: Deal 1D to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, gain 1A.

card.name: OIC Taber
card.text: Fight/Reap: You may play or use a non-Star Alliance card this turn.

card.name: Materializador
card.text: You may play upgrades as if they belonged to the active house.

card.name: Colono Chapman
card.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Play: Capture all A from each player.

card.name: Eureca!
card.text: Alpha. Play: Gain 2A. Archive 2 random cards.

card.name: O Protetor do Cofre
card.text: Your A cannot be stolen.

card.name: Lança Poderosa
card.text: Play: Deal 3D to a creature and 3D to a neighbor of that creature.

card.name: Censor Filo
card.text: Play: Deal 5D to a creature with A on it.

card.name: Mestresmola
card.text: Deploy. Each of Almsmaster's neighbors gains, "Destroyed: Steal 1A."

card.name: Prof. Aposentado Kering
card.text: Deploy. (M) Play/Fight/Reap: Use 1 of Prof. Emeritus Kering's neighbors. If the tide is high, also use Prof. Emeritus Kering's other neighbor.

card.name: Hidrocatalogador
card.text: (M) After a player raises the tide, they archive the top card of their deck.

card.name: Sacerdote Sombrio Glebe
card.text: After you play an Aquan creature, exhaust an enemy creature.

card.name: Sauropóde de Tróia
card.text: Trojan Sauropod enters play under your opponent’s control. Omni: Gain 3A. Your opponent reveals their hand and puts each creature from it into play ready, then refills their hand as if it were their "draw cards" step. Destroy Trojan Sauropod.

card.name: Escudoideira
card.text: Shield-U-Later may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: “This creature gets +2 armor.”

card.name: Exploradora de Mutações
card.text: Enhance AD. (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

card.name: Crassosaurus
card.text: Elusive. Play: Capture 10A from any combination of players. Then, if Crassosaurus has fewer than 10A on it, purge Crassosaurus.

card.name: Armadilha
card.text: Play: Deal 4D to a creature that is not on a flank, with 2D splash.

card.name: Taniwha
card.text: Fight/Reap: Put a creature from your discard pile on top of your deck.

card.name: Gizelhart, o Profeta Louco
card.text: While Mad Prophet Gizelhart is in the center of your battleline, it gains, "Action: Fully heal each non-Mutant creature. Gain 1A for each creature healed this way."

card.name: Nagoa Legra
card.text: Llack Gaboon gets +1 power for each other exhausted creature. If there are 3 or more other exhausted creatures, Llack Gaboon gains skirmish and hazardous 5.

card.name: Pisoteio
card.text: Play: If you used 3 or more creatures this turn, steal 2A.

card.name: Ambrósio Eclético
card.text: At the end of your turn, put a knowledge counter on Eclectic Ambrosius. Action: Remove 3 knowledge counters from Eclectic Ambrosius. If you do, gain 6A.

card.name: Revelação de Omm
card.text: Omni: Destroy Gorm of Omm. Destroy an artifact.

card.name: Crença da Natureza
card.text: Omni: Destroy Creed of Nature. If you do, choose a creature. For the remainder of the turn, that creature gains skirmish and assault X. X is its power.

card.name: Superpopulação
card.text: Play: Destroy one third of all enemy creatures and one third of all friendly creatures (rounding up each time).

card.name: Maginsígnia
card.text: Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.) Fight: Ready and fight with each of Badgemagus's neighbors, one at a time.

card.name: Surto de Crescimento
card.text: Play: Give a flank creature three +1 power counters. Give its neighbor two +1 power counters. Give the second creature's other neighbor a +1 power counter.

card.name: Catiça
card.text: After 1 of Holdfast's neighbors is dealt damage, ready Holdfast.

card.name: A Maré
card.text: Maré Alta (A sua maré está alta.) Maré Baixa (A sua maré está baixa.) Omni: Suba a maré. Ganhe 3 correntes.

card.name: Terrível Synan
card.text: Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)

card.name: Adivinha Cinza
card.text: Each of Grey Augur's neighbors gains, "Fight: Gain 1A."

card.name: Lorde Golgotha
card.text: Before Fight: Deal 3D to each neighbor of the creature Lord Golgotha fights.

card.name: Capitão Kresage
card.text: While you control another creature with elusive, taunt, poison, or skirmish, Captain Kresage gains that keyword.

card.name: Caçada de Persistência
card.text: Play: Choose a house. Exhaust each enemy creature of the chosen house.

card.name: Hyde
card.text: Reap: Draw a card. If you control Velum, draw 2 cards instead. Destroyed: Archive Velum from your discard pile. If you do, archive Hyde.

card.name: Boia ou Afunda?
card.text: (M) Play: Each player loses 1A. If the tide is high, each player loses half their A instead (rounding down the loss).

card.name: Deipno Mestre-Espião
card.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Omni: Choose a friendly creature. You may use that creature this turn.

card.name: Escifo
card.text: Hazardous 4. (M) Destroyed: If the tide is high, archive Scyphos.

card.name: Forjando uma Aliança
card.text: Play: Forge a key at +7A current cost, reduced by 1A (to a maximum of 6) for each house represented among cards in play.

card.name: Adivinha Cinza
card.text: Each of Grey Augur's neighbors gains, "Reap: Gain 1A and exalt this creature."

card.name: Lapissauro
card.text: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.) While attacking Lapisaurus, enemy creatures gain, “Before Fight: Exalt this creature.”

card.name: Profa. Garwynne
card.text: Elusive. Reap: You may choose a card in your archives and put it into your hand.

card.name: O Sussurros
card.text: Action: Exhaust a friendly Unfathomable creature. If you do, exhaust up to 3 creatures and/or artifacts.

card.name: Possante
card.text: Play: You may exalt Monty Bank up to 2 times. Action: Steal 1A for each A on Monty Bank.

card.name: Velum
card.text: Reap: Archive a card. If you control Hyde, archive 2 cards instead. Destroyed: Archive Hyde from your discard pile. If you do, archive Velum.

card.name: Ritual da Vida
card.text: Action: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, return a different creature from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Senescal Sargassa
card.text: (M) After a player raises the tide, Seneschal Sargassa captures 2A from your opponent.

card.name: Zap
card.text: Play: Deal 1D to a creature for each house represented among creatures in play.

card.name: Análise Definitiva
card.text: Play: Destroy each creature. Each player draws a card for each creature they controlled that was destroyed this way.

card.name: Francis, o "Economista"
card.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Fight: Each player gains 1A.

card.name: Fazer a Limpa
card.text: Play: Deal 1D to each creature. Destroy each upgrade.

card.name: Pergaminho de Möbius
card.text: Action: Archive Mobius Scroll and up to 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: L30-P4RD0
card.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) (M) While the tide is high, each of CH-337A's neighbors gains skirmish.

card.name: União ou Discórdia
card.text: Play: Choose one: • Use a friendly non-Star Alliance creature. • Return up to 2 friendly creatures and each upgrade attached to them to their owners’ hands.

card.name: Salteador Carrancudo
card.text: Skirmish. Scowly Caper enters play under your opponent’s control and can be used as if it belonged to any house. At the end of your turn, destroy 1 of Scowly Caper’s neighbors.

card.name: Pense Duas Vezes
card.text: Play: Play an action card from your discard pile, then purge it.

card.name: Homem-Cogumelo
card.text: Mushroom Man gets +3 power for each unforged key you have.

card.name: Equilíbrio Pontuado
card.text: Play: Each player discards their hand, then refills their hand as if it were their “draw cards” step.

card.name: Árvore do Mundo
card.text: Action: Return a creature from your discard pile to the top of your deck.

card.name: Pérola Ecoante
card.text: Omni: Destroy Echo Pearl. Exhaust, stun, and enrage a creature.

card.name: Entrou de Gaiato
card.text: Play: Deal 1D to each creature. Gain 1A for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: Suga-Æmbar
card.text: (M) Play: Raise the tide. (M) This creature gains, "At the start of your turn, if the tide is high, capture 2A."

card.name: Time Visitante
card.text: Destroyed: Put each upgrade on Away Team into its owner’s archives.

card.name: Lærie do Lago
card.text: (M) While the tide is high, each friendly creature gets +2 armor.

card.name: Ombreira
card.text: While this creature is on a flank, it gets +2 armor and +2 power.

card.name: Senescal Sargassa
card.text: (M) After a player raises the tide, a creature they control captures 2A from their opponent.

card.name: Nivelar
card.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.) Play: Capture all but 5 of your opponent’s A, distributed among any number of friendly creatures.

card.name: Ostracizar
card.text: Play: Lose 1A. If you do, purge a creature.

card.name: Távola Redonda
card.text: Each friendly Knight creature gets +1 power and gains taunt.

card.name: Bracanália
card.text: Play: Put 4A on Bracchanalia from the common supply. A friendly creature captures 1A. At the start of each player’s turn, if that player controls 4 or more creatures with A on them, move each A from Bracchanalia to that player’s pool.

card.name: Valocanto
card.text: (M) While the tide is low, Valoocanth cannot be used. Fight/Reap: Exhaust an enemy creature and each of its neighbors.

card.name: Devorado Vivo
card.text: (M) Play only if the tide is high. Play: Choose 2 creatures. Purge the chosen creature with the lowest power and give +1 power counters equal to its power to the other chosen creature.

card.name: Nado Raso
card.text: Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your opponent’s deck. Discard 1, put 1 on the bottom of their deck, and put 1 on top of their deck.

card.name: Coleta ou Semeio
card.text: Play: Choose one: • Ready and reap with a friendly creature. • Give three +1 power counters to creatures, distributed as you choose.

card.name: Terrordáctilo
card.text: Terrordactyl enters play stunned. Terrordactyl only deals 4D when fighting. Before Fight: Deal 4D to each neighbor of the creature Terrordactyl fights.

card.name: Kiri Aurespinha
card.text: Elusive. After an enemy creature reaps, it does not ready during its controller's next "ready cards" step.

card.name: Sir Bevor
card.text: Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)

card.name: Tubarão-Æmbar
card.text: Play: Give Æmberfin Shark three +1 power counters. At the end of your turn, remove a +1 power counter from Æmberfin Shark. If you do, each player gains 1A.

card.text: This creature cannot ready.

card.name: Anel da Invisibilidade
card.text: This creature gains elusive and skirmish.

card.name: Plano B
card.text: Play: For each creature your opponent controls in excess of you, archive the top card of your deck.

card.name: Vingança do Arconte
card.text: Action: Exhaust up to 2 friendly Shadows creatures. For each creature exhausted this way, steal 1A.

card.name: Reduzir o Rebanho
card.text: Play: Shuffle the 4 least powerful creatures into their owners’ decks.

card.name: Orbe da Maravilha
card.text: Omni: Destroy Orb of Wonder. If you do, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Bruxo Crepuscular
card.text: Play: Return a creature from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Emissário Octavia
card.text: Action: Capture 2A.

card.name: Congelamento Súbito
card.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, after you play another card, exhaust a creature.

card.name: Blaster do Oficial
card.text: This creature gets +2 power. This creature gains, “Destroyed: Attach Officer’s Blaster to this creature's right neighbor.”

card.name: Mente Sobre Matéria
card.text: Play: Put each creature into its owner's archives.

card.name: Afana-Manto
card.text: Fight/Reap: If you have less A than your opponent, steal 1A. Otherwise, each player gains 1A.

card.name: Cajado Congelador
card.text: Action: Exhaust a creature or artifact.

card.name: Flofinhu
card.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Fight: Give a Beast creature two +1 power counters.

card.name: Descoberta do Bioma
card.text: (M) Play: If the tide is high, you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck and discard 1 of them. Otherwise, raise the tide.

card.name: Ruth Sorridente
card.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: If you forged a key this turn, take control of an enemy flank creature.

card.name: Simpson Valentão
card.text: (M) Reap: If the tide is high, a damaged creature captures 1A from its own side.

card.name: Experimento Imprudente
card.text: This creature gains, "Reap: Play the top card of your deck."

card.name: Módulo 5UB-M3R50
card.text: (M) While the tide is high, this creature gains skirmish. (M) While the tide is low, this creature gains elusive.

card.name: Tirar Vantagem
card.text: (M) Play: If the tide is high, a friendly creature captures 3A. Otherwise, raise the tide.

card.name: O Arquivista

card.name: Bosquepraga
card.text: Each creature enters play enraged.

card.name: Lapissauro
card.text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Fight: Exalt the creature Lapisaurus fights.

card.text: Play: Remove up to three +1 power counters from a creature. Gain 1A for each counter removed this way.

card.text: Play: Look at your opponent's hand. Choose a card from it and put it on top of their deck.

card.name: Ritual Harmônico
card.text: Play: Choose a friendly creature. If its left neighbor shares a house with it, gain 1A and repeat this effect on that creature.

card.name: Mestra Vita
card.text: Play/Reap: You may exalt a friendly non-Saurian creature. If you do, reap with it.

card.name: Laboratório no Telhado
card.text: Each friendly Scientist creature enters play ready.

card.name: Doutor Lacus
card.text: (M) While the tide is high, you may spend A on friendly creatures as if it were in your pool.

card.name: Caverna do Peixe-Ogro
card.text: At the end of your turn, destroy the least powerful creature.

card.name: Verdade Radiante
card.text: Play: Stun each enemy creature not on a flank.

card.name: Cangufante
card.text: Each creature gains, “Reap: Destroy this creature.”

card.name: Urien, o Prudente
card.text: Reap: Gain A equal to Urien the Circumspect's armor.

card.name: Honra ou Glória
card.text: Play: Choose one: • Deal 3D to each flank creature. • Deal 3D to each creature not on a flank.

card.name: General Sherman
card.text: General Sherman deals no damage when fighting. Play: Purge each other creature. If General Sherman leaves play, return to play each creature purged this way (exhausted and under its owner’s control).

card.name: Coletor Corpulento
card.text: Play: Capture all of your opponent's A. Deal 1D to The Corpulent Collector for each A on it.

card.name: Chamado do Arconte
card.text: Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.) Play: Draw 5 cards.

card.name: Dr. Verokter
card.text: Elusive. Reap: Put an upgrade or action card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

card.name: Saco de Moedas
card.text: Play: Deal 1D to a creature for each A you have.

card.name: Saquear ou Pilhar
card.text: Play: Choose one: • Steal 1A. • A friendly creature captures 3A.

card.name: Keysis Ovacionada
card.text: Play: Forge a key at +7A current cost, reduced by 1A for each card you have played this turn (including this one). If you do, purge Honors Keysis.

card.name: Sapochave
card.text: Destroyed: Forge a key at current cost.

card.name: Cântico de Rakuzel
card.text: (M) Play: Exhaust a creature. If the tide is high, exhaust each creature instead.

card.name: Todo Amareado
card.text: (M) Play: If the tide is high, gain 1A. Otherwise, raise the tide.

card.name: Arqueólogo de Novu
card.text: Action: Archive a card from your discard pile.

card.name: Julgado pela Água
card.text: (M) Play: Reset the tide. Until the start of your next turn, players cannot raise the tide.

card.name: Muralha de Haedroth
card.text: Each friendly flank creature gets +2 power.

card.name: Cavaleiro Estoico
card.text: Staunch Knight gets +2 power while it is on a flank.

card.name: Intendente Guelrafogo
card.text: (M) After your opponent raises the tide, enrage Flamegill Enforcer. Action: Capture 3A.

card.name: O Dispositivo Ulfberht
card.text: Each player cannot choose the same active house they chose on their previous turn.

card.name: Agulha Perseguidora
card.text: Action: Deal 1D to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, gain 1A.

card.name: Infiltrado
card.text: This creature gains, "Your opponent may spend A on this creature as if it were in their pool."

card.name: Ordem Geral 24
card.text: At the start of each player’s turn, they must choose a creature they control and destroy each creature of the chosen creature’s house. If that player has no creatures in play, destroy General Order 24 instead.

card.name: Zenzizenzizênzica
card.text: While Zenzizenzizenzic is in the center of your battleline, refill your hand to 2 additional cards during your "draw cards" step.

card.name: Você que Lute
card.text: Play: Choose a house. Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card belongs to the chosen house, draw it and trigger this effect again.

card.name: O Coliseu
card.text: After an enemy creature is destroyed while fighting, put a glory counter on The Colosseum. Omni: If there are 6 or more glory counters on The Colosseum, remove 6 and forge a key at current cost.

card.name: Escudoideira
card.text: Shield-U-Later may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: “This creature loses all armor and gets –2 power.”

card.name: Sir Bevor
card.text: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)

card.name: Espólios de Batalha
card.text: Play: A friendly creature captures 1A. Each creature with A on it captures 1A from its opponent.

card.name: Mudança Fásica
card.text: Play: You may play a non-Logos card this turn.

card.name: Velho Bruno
card.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Play: Capture 3A.

card.name: Marretada
card.text: Play: Destroy each creature that does not share a house with at least 1 of its neighbors.

card.name: Trava da Mão Rubra
card.text: After A is stolen from you, your opponent skips the "forge a key" step during their next turn.

card.name: Operativo Espion
card.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) (M) After a player raises the tide during their turn, they may use a creature they control.

card.name: Profa. Garwynne
card.text: Skirmish. Fight: You may choose a card in your archives and put it into your hand.

card.name: Fanático Abissal
card.text: (M) After you raise the tide, capture 2A. (M) After your opponent raises the tide, move 2A from Abyssal Zealot to the common supply.

card.name: Agente Sepdia
card.text: (M) Fight/Reap: Deal 1D to a creature. If the tide is high, stun that creature.

card.name: Investida Esmagadora
card.text: Play: Destroy each creature with power 4 or lower. Gain 1 chain.

card.name: Mestregancho
card.text: (M) Fight: If the tide is high, your opponent loses 2A.

card.name: Ritual de Equilíbrio
card.text: Action: If your opponent has 6A or more, steal 1A.

card.name: Mecaboia
card.text: (M) At the start of each player’s turn, if the tide is high for that player, they gain 1A.

card.name: Macacos-Piranha
card.text: Play/Reap: Deal 2D to each other creature.

card.name: Perebento
card.text: Reap: Give Sporegorger a +1 power counter. You may remove each +1 power counter from Sporegorger. For each counter removed this way, deal 1D to each other creature.

card.name: Baú do Homem Morto
card.text: Play: Put 4A on Dead Man’s Chest from the common supply. Deal 2D to a creature. After 6 or more creatures are destroyed in a turn, if Dead Man’s Chest is ready, move each A from Dead Man’s Chest to the active player's pool.

card.name: Instrumento do Silêncio
card.text: This creature gains skirmish and, “Fight: Gain 1A.”

card.name: Mamangave
card.text: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: Give two +1 power counters to each other friendly Untamed creature.

card.name: Willa Caolha
card.text: Elusive. Skirmish. (M) Fight: If the tide is high, your opponent loses 2A.

card.name: Bomba de Miasma
card.text: Enhance D. (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.) Action: Destroy Miasma Bomb. Your opponent skips the "forge a key" step during their next turn.

card.name: Mergulho Profundo
card.text: Play: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck. Put a creature that shares a house with that card on the bottom of its owner's deck.

card.name: Martelograma
card.text: Play: Deal 3D to a creature and stun it.

card.name: Dir. de Recursos Hawkins
card.text: Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.) Play: Gain 1A for each of C.R. Officer Hawkins's non-Star Alliance neighbors.

card.name: Kaupe
card.text: You cannot play more than 1 card of each type each turn. Fight/Reap: Discard any number of cards from your hand. For each card discarded this way, deal 2D to an enemy creature.

card.name: Willa Caolha
card.text: (M) While the tide is high, One-Eyed Willa gains elusive and skirmish. Fight: Steal 1A.

card.name: Ferruginoso
card.text: Reap: Exhaust each enemy artifact.

card.name: Campo de Força
card.text: This creature gains, "Reap: Ward this creature."

card.name: Explorador de Anomalias
card.text: Action: Destroy a damaged creature.

card.name: Braquiadito

card.name: Detetive Devaneio
card.text: (M) Reap: If the tide is high, draw 3 cards.

card.name: Tamo Junto!
card.text: (M) Play: You may play a non-Star Alliance card. If the tide is high, you may play another non-Star Alliance card.

card.name: Moréia Binária

card.name: Marborgue Australis

card.name: Ira ou Ruína
card.text: Play: Choose one: • Destroy a flank creature. • Return 2 enemy creatures to their owners’ hands.

card.name: Tenente Valmart
card.text: (M) Play/Fight/Reap: If the tide is high, keys cost +3A during your opponent's next turn.

card.name: Relíquia Primitiva
card.text: Play: Put 4A on Primal Relic from the common supply. Give 3 creatures a +1 power counter. At the start of each player’s turn, if they control creatures with total power 20 or higher, move each A from Primal Relic to that player's pool.

card.name: Madrugadores
card.text: Alpha. Play: Ready each Shadows card.

card.name: Toninhaí
card.text: (M) Play: Raise the tide. Enrage 2 enemy creatures.

card.name: Porta Para o Céu
card.text: Play: Each player with 6A or more loses all but 5 of it.

card.text: Play: Choose one: • Archive a card. • Gain 1A for each card in your archives.

card.name: Inhãzinho

card.name: Estilo Pixie
card.text: This creature gains, "Reap: Gain 1A."

card.name: Guardião do Portal
card.text: Play: If your opponent has 7A or more, capture all but 5 of it.

card.name: Sem Desperdício
card.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. Draw cards equal to half that creature's power (rounding up).

card.name: Viagem de Tributação
card.text: Play: A friendly creature captures 1A. Each of its neighbors that shares a house with it also captures 1A.

card.name: Quark Mortal Saltitante
card.text: Play: Destroy an enemy creature and a friendly creature. You may repeat this effect as many times as you like, as long as it is possible to repeat the entire effect.

card.name: Armadura Seráfica
card.text: This creature gets +1 armor. Play: Fully heal this creature.

card.text: (M) Reap: If the tide is high, your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

card.name: Cientista Felix
card.text: (M) Play/Fight: If the tide is low, you may exalt a creature.

card.name: Conselho da Aliança
card.text: Play: Choose a creature of each house. Destroy each creature not chosen.

card.name: Undagnato
card.text: (M) While the tide is low, Undagnathus deals no damage when fighting.

card.name: Lanceirus Raptor
card.text: Before Fight: You may exalt Hastatus Raptor. If you do, deal 1D to the creature Hastatus Raptor fights for each A on friendly Hastatus Raptors.

card.name: Kraken Te-Wheke
card.text: Play: Exhaust 2 friendly Unfathomable creatures. If you do not, destroy Te-wheke Kraken. Fight/Reap: Deal 2D to a creature, with 2D splash.

card.name: Ursa Anciã
card.text: Assault 3. While Eldest Bear is in the center of your battleline, it gains, "Before Fight: Gain 2A."

card.name: Intendente Guelrafogo
card.text: (M) After your opponent raises the tide, enrage Flamegill Enforcer. Action: Steal 1A.

card.name: Marechal Moringa
card.text: (M) Play/Fight: Raise the tide.

card.name: Armadrone
card.text: Fight: Steal 2A.

card.name: Milióbio
card.text: (M) While the tide is high, Myliobe gains skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Before Fight: Enrage the creature Myliobe fights and each of that creature’s neighbors.

card.name: Cila
card.text: Each enemy creature gains, "Reap: Deal 4D to this creature."

card.name: Corroer
card.text: Play: Choose one: • Destroy an artifact. • Destroy an upgrade. • Destroy a creature with armor.

card.name: Operativo Espion
card.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) (M) After a player raises the tide during their turn, they may deal 3D to a creature.

card.name: Brend, o Fanático
card.text: Skirmish. Play: Your opponent gains 1A. Destroyed: Steal 3A.

card.name: Velho Ranheta
card.text: Destroyed: Ward each of Old Egad's neighbors.

card.name: Enterrar Tesouros
card.text: (M) Play: If the tide is high, move 1A from each creature to its controller's pool. Otherwise, raise the tide.

card.name: A Fonte Secou
card.text: (M) Each creature gains, “While the tide is low, this creature cannot reap.”

card.name: Descoberta Arrasadora
card.text: Play: If you control Dr. Verokter, Rooftop Laboratory, and Reckless Experimentation, destroy each card in play, unforge an opponent’s key, and purge Groundbreaking Discovery.

card.name: Fila, a Pesquisadora
card.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) After a creature is played adjacent to Fila the Researcher, draw a card.

card.name: Guardião do Santuário
card.text: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.) Fight/Reap: Swap Sanctum Guardian with another friendly creature in your battleline.

card.name: Com. Oficial Hings
card.text: Play: You may search your deck for Com. Officer Gross, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. Fight/Reap: Draw 1 card for each creature between Com. Officer Hings and Com. Officer Gross.

card.name: Trincheira de Kiligog
card.text: At the end of your turn, place 1 depth counter on Kiligog’s Trench, then destroy each creature with power equal to the number of depth counters on Kiligog’s Trench.

card.name: Corrupção Generalizada
card.text: After a player gains A by reaping, a creature they do not control captures that A.

card.name: Descoberta Sombria
card.text: Play: Name 2 cards. Discard the bottom 2 cards of your opponent's deck. If they are the named cards, purge Dark Discovery and forge a key at no cost.

card.name: Decadência
card.text: Play: Choose one: • Exalt, ready, and use a friendly creature. • Move 1A from a creature to another creature.

card.name: General Xalvador
card.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

card.name: Oficial de Ciência Qincan
card.text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) After a player chooses an active house which matches no cards in play, steal 1A.

card.name: Atordoador
card.text: This creature gains, "Fight/Reap: You may stun a creature."

card.name: T3R-35A
card.text: T3R-35A may be used as if it belonged to either of its neighbor's houses. T3R-35A may be played as an upgrade instead of a creature, with the text: “This creature may be used as if it belonged to either of its neighbor's houses.”

card.name: Roubo Descarado
card.text: Play: Enrage an enemy creature. Move all A from that creature to your pool.

card.name: Mártir
card.text: Instead of readying creatures they control during their “ready cards” step, your opponent deals 1D to The Chosen One for each exhausted creature they control.

card.name: Colono Chapman
card.text: Taunt. Each of Colonist Chapman's non-Star Alliance neighbors gains, "Reap: Gain 1A."

card.name: Numquid, a Bela
card.text: Play: Destroy an enemy creature. Repeat this effect if your opponent still controls more creatures than you.

card.name: Talmage Encoraçado
card.text: Play: Deal damage to an enemy creature equal to the number of cards you have played this turn (including this one).

card.name: Dragonete-Flor
card.text: Blossom Drake gets +1 power for each artifact in play. Each artifact’s text box is considered blank (except for traits).

card.name: Fausto, o Grande
card.text: Your opponent's keys cost +1A for each friendly creature with A on it. Play: You may exalt a friendly creature.

card.name: Fada Delinquente
card.text: (M) Play: Raise the tide. (M) Before Fight: If the tide is high, steal 1A.

card.name: Capitão Barba-Nula
card.text: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.) Destroyed: Each of Captain No-Beard's neighbors captures 1A.

card.name: Plano Magistral
card.text: Play: Put a card from your hand facedown under Masterplan. Omni: Play the card under Masterplan. Destroy Masterplan.

card.name: Perebento
card.text: Play: Move each +1 power counter in play to Sporegorger. Reap: You may remove each +1 power counter from Sporegorger. For each counter removed this way, deal 1D to each other creature.

card.name: Cântico da Fertilidade
card.text: Play: Your opponent gains 2A.

card.name: Bestiarii Urso
card.text: Play/Reap: You may unstun a creature.

card.name: Bruxo Crepuscular
card.text: Play: Destroy another friendly creature. If you do, play a different creature from your discard pile. Ready and use that creature.

card.name: Forja Imperial
card.text: Play: Forge a key at +8A current cost, reduced by 1A for each A on friendly creatures.

card.name: Fazendo a Rapa
card.text: Play: Steal 1A. Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Shadows card, trigger this effect again.

card.name: Caneco
card.text: Play: Move 1A from a creature to your pool. Deal 2D to that creature.
